item.title: 1973 Chevrolet Veraneio + Trailer v1.56 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | October 16, 2025

1973 Chevrolet Veraneio + Trailer v1.56 ETS2

Changes:
– Update for 1.56 game version

Features:
– 2 Engine Options: 125 hp, 180 hp
– 5 speeds Transmission
– 3 Metallic Paintjobs: Preto, Cinza, Azul
– Small Tuning Options
– Included Car Trailer

Credits: Quality3D Mods

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Santiago de Compostela added V12 1.56 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | October 16, 2025

Santiago de Compostela added V12 1.56 ETS2

This is the twelfth version of my map.
I have continued to rebuild its different parts to achieve the greatest possible realism. On this occasion there have been countless places re-recreated and fixed, and I consider at this point to have reached the highest possible level with the available elements. So quality standards can only be raised with the emergence of new models in the map editor that are more like the real world. Although the map can also be improved with updates that adapt it to the new features as a result of the development of ets2 or also with the addition of new zones.
I have also worked on the optimization of the map, using both the cut planes and the gradation of objects with distance or the elimination of unnecessary objects. For the same reason, I have maintained at moderate levels both traffic in the form of parked vehicles and the number of pedestrians in urban centres. I hope this can change in the future.
As a new feature I have added two viewpoints, one in Santiago with scenes of the old town and another in Bertamiráns with scenes of the most emblematic areas of the village.
No errors or warnings in the game.log. Totally clean.
Well optimized. It works smoothly on even the least powerful computers.
Corrected and adapted for version 1.56. It should also work with older versions.

Credits: Edsor

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: The Godfather’s Kenworth K Series Skins Pack v1.4 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | October 16, 2025

The Godfather’s Kenworth K Series Skins Pack v1.4 ATS

The Godfather’s Kenworth K Series Trucks Skins Pack

This is a Kenworth Truck Skins Pack for the K Series Trucks of the Kenworth K100 From the Stream Workshop plus K200 RTA Paided Mod Truck, K108 RTA Mods Paid Mod Truck & K104 Modded Truck
And has some Real Life Trucking Companys and Brands and much more high Deatailing and built using Mod Studio 2. All skins in the pack are copyright owned by The Godfather’s Mods Company EST 2021 & Australia Worldwide Entertainment and are only for entertainment use.

v1.0 (Launch Release)
The Launch edition of the pack has K100/K104/108 & K200 Skins in the pack

v1.1 (Update May 2025)
This update brings the pack in line with the update to 1.54 of ATS plus adds 5 New K108 Skins & 7 New K200RTA/Paboy Skins plus we have fixed all 41 K100 Overfloater Skins to now work with the updated Steam Workshop edition pack has been updated for 1.54 of ATS.

v1.2 (Update July 2025)
This Update Brings 22 New Skins to the pack, with 15 new skins for the Kenworth K200 RTA/Paboy Truck, 4 New Kenworth K104B Skins & 3 New Kenworth K108 RTA Skins list of new skins is listed below, with the other skins in the pack. This update brings the pack up to ATS v1.55

v1.3 (Update September 4th 2025)
This Update brings 5 new skins for the Kenworth K200 RTA / Paboy Truck and 1 updated skin for the K200 RTA / Paboy Plus, 1 new skin for the Kenworth K108 RTA, 1 New Skin for the Kenworth K100 & 4 New skins for the Kenworth K104 Truck, with a total of 12 New Skins

V1.4 (Update October 16th 2025)
This Update brings a total of 17 new skins to the K Series pack, with 10 new skins for the Kenworth K200 RTA/Paboy Truck, 4 new skins for the K108 RTA Truck, 2 new skins for the K104B Truck & 1 New skin for the K100 Truck from Stream Workshop. This brings the pack up to a total of 309 Skins.

List of Skins is listed below. Ones that are shown (NEW) have been added to the latest Update to the Mod.
